definitions.definition: the whole physical structure that forms a person or animal:
examples: A good diet and plenty of exercise will help you to keep your body healthy.

definitions.definition: the main part of a person's or animal's body, without the head, or without the head, arms, and legs:
examples: He had a fat body but thin legs and arms.
A body was washed up on the beach last week.

definitions.definition: the painted metal shell of a vehicle, such as a car or an aircraft

examples: How is a body supposed to live in these conditions?

definitions.definition: a piece of tight-fitting women's clothing that covers the top half of the body and fastens between the legs
